content: **kanssakulkijat fellow travellers hand puppet mittens** children living in crisis areas often need something warm to wear and something to cheer them up these mittens can be used both as hand puppets and as warm mittens the author wishes that you make at least one pair of kanssakulkijat mittens for children located in crisis locations let s help those in need together the mittens are primarily crocheted with single_crochet stitches all stitches are always crocheted into the back loop of the previous row s stitch **size hook and yarn and supplies** 2 5-3 mm hook = children s mittens 3 5 mm = adult mittens choose yarn suitable for the hook for children s mittens about 50 g of dk weight yarn 100 g = 260 m like novita nalle for adult mittens about 80 g of aran weight yarn 100 g = 200 m like novita 7 veljestä leftover yarns are also suitable as long as they match the hook size additionally you ll need scissors a darning needle and a button **about the pattern** the mitten is crocheted from the cuff to the tip the thumb gusset is crocheted on the side of the mitten allowing the mitten to be worn on either hand the decreases for the tip are made as the star decreases to allow the mittens to be attached to each other a yarn loop is crocheted at the end of one mitten and a button is added to the other adult mittens are made using the same pattern as children s mittens add an additional 4 row for the body and 3 row to the thumb length to make adult size watch how-to-make videos on my instagram stories highlights www instagram com/maijuahlgren fi 1 1 https //www instagram com/maijuahlgren fi
